LanguageData.JRWCaihongReconstruct.label: Caihong
LanguageData.JRWCaihongReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03923-2018 [CAIHONG JUJI] CODENAME: PRISM >96
A fairly new species of paravian theropod that shines a brilliant hue of rainbow colours. While not exactly strong, they are quite viscious and are not afraid to attack things bigger than itself.
LanguageData.JRWCaihongReconstruct.tools.teeth.label: teeth
LanguageData.JRWCaihongReconstruct.tools.head.label: head
